allow_removal.description: DANGEROUS: When true files in this repo that are NOT in the central sync config will be DELETED. This can cause data loss. Strongly recommend keeping this false

exclude.description: File paths (relative to repo root) to exclude from sync. These files will NOT be created/updated in this repository. Existing files at these paths are preserved but not managed

skip.description: Skip file synchronization only. Label sync still runs unless sync.skip or sync.labels.skip is true

allow_removal.description: When true labels in this repo that are NOT in the central config will be DELETED. Use with caution - this removes custom labels

exclude.description: Label names to exclude from synchronization. These labels will NOT be created/updated in this repository. Existing labels with these names are preserved but not managed

skip.description: Skip label synchronization only. File sync still runs unless sync.skip or sync.files.skip is true
Skip smyklot version synchronization only. Label and file sync still run unless their respective skip flags are set. Use this for repos that don't use smyklot or manage their own versions

sync.description: Top-level sync configuration controlling label file and smyklot version synchronization behavior

skip.description: Skip ALL syncs for this repository. Equivalent to setting labels.skip files.skip and smyklot.skip to true

description: Configuration for organization-wide label, file, and smyklot version synchronization. Place at .github/sync-config.yml in your repository.
title: Sync Configuration
